#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int n,t,cal,i,maxi,num;
	map<int,string> m;
	m[0]="red";
	m[1]="blue";
	m[2]="pink";
	m[3]="white";
	m[4]="black";
	m[5]="violet";
	m[6]="cyan";
	m[7]="yellow";
	m[8]="green";
	m[9]="brown";
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%d",&n);
		maxi=0;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			scanf("%d",&num);
			cal=0;
			while(num)
			{
				cal+=(num%10);
				num/=10;
			}
			if(cal)
			{
				if(cal%9==0)
				{
					cal=9;
				}
				else
				{
					cal=cal%9;
				}
			}
			maxi=max(maxi,cal);
		}
		//cout<<maxi<<endl;
		cout<<m[maxi]<<"\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
